amendment.description: To provide for 2 programs to authorize the use of leave by caregivers for family members of certain individuals performing military service, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4215 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4215 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Jeffords. (consideration: CR S6117-6122) To provide for 2 programs to authorize the use of leave by caregivers for family members of certain individuals performing military service, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4215 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Jeffords.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4215 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
